main_desc: Favorite hobby to create 3d scenes and fill them with interesting mechanics. Thanks to WebGL, I am showing my skills in browser applications. I prefer to use the three.js library and vanilla JavaScript, and Vue.js to build the GUI.
req000: The first year I was page-proofs typesetting templates and creating components for CRM Bitrix24.
req001: In the second year, I was transferred to the development department of the ordering system. At this stage, engaged in the development and support of a custom system for working with company projects.
req002: As a result of my interest in 3D graphics, a new small department was organized together with the bosses, in the last two years I worked on creating a new ordering system that would be as simple as possible for an ordinary user. Participating in this project, I was mostly engaged in working on a 3D engine for the system, as well as designing the application and the communication interface between the user and the 3D scene.
tecknute: Trade and Economic College of KNUTE
req100: Studied as a specialist in the information technology of an enterprise.
req101: Studied the basics of economics and enterprise management, and also mastered the basic principles of programming.
knute: Kyiv National University of Trade and Economics
req110: Studied for a bachelor's degree in software engineering.
req111: Studied various software development techniques and patterns.
